question: Which technology company has recently won the prestigious Cloud project with the U.S. Department of Defense?
explanation:
Technology major Google has recently bagged the prestigious Cloud project with the U.S. Department of Defense.
This US Government project is the pilot project of Google with DoDâ€™s Defense Innovation Unit (DIU). The project is about building secure cloud management solution to detect and protect against cyber threats worldwide. Earlier, Google had lost the $10 billion Pentagon Cloud project which was won by its counterpart Microsoft.
